user.title: Set up DayBetter Services
user.description:
Please enter your DayBetter user code to create the integration.

The integration will automatically:
1. Create connection and obtain access token
2. Fetch your device list
3. Fetch device type information (PIDs)
4. Periodically sync temperature and humidity sensor status
